title: EXPLOSION & BLAST :  PACK 2
description: High Quality, Ground-Shaking Explosions Foley Sound Effects
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE


"EXPLOSION & BLAST PACK 2 offers an excellent and distinct experience compared to our previous Pack 1 in the EXPLOSION & BLAST SERIES. This new pack introduces three unique sound categories:


POWER EXPLOSION: These explosions cover the full frequency range, emphasizing the impact. Expect powerful and intense detonations.


DESTRUCTION EXPLOSION: This category combines explosion sounds with destructive elements—metal, glass, and rocks. The result is an immersive blend that simulates an explosion occurring over a building, car, or other large objects."


BOOMY EXPLOSION : Fuller bass, less emphasis on the mid and high frequencies.


We created this sound effects with industry-leading sound design tools and further polished them in our go-to-DAW
technicalDetails:
Category Folders:-

POWER EXPLOSION - 30 Explosions

DESTRUCTION EXPLOSION - 50 Explosions

Boomy Explosion - 30 Explosions


Number of Audio Waves: 110

Number of Audio Cues: 110

Sample rate / bit rate: 48 KHz 24 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 8:03

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
